about_the_game:
Welcome to 3Cushion Masters!

Game system
-Realistic 3D physics effects
-Apply changes to the ball according to the degree of follow shot
-Implementation of change in frictional force according to table conditions
-Implementation of squad phenomenon
-Real sound effects
-Replay function
-Powerful simulation with accurate ball physics
-Practice mode / various single modes
-Ranking system to view records of one season
-There are 3 modes: 1v1, 2v2 and survival match

6 types of game
-3 cushion, 1 cushion, 4 ball, 6 ball, 8 ball and 9 ball

Game rules
-WMB TOUR Tournament (online)
Participate in the WMB tournament hosted by 8 sponsors
Tournament starts from round of 128.
If there are not enough applicants, they will be replaced with actual PBA players (AI)

-Friendly Match (online)
Play with users freely
You can also play a game by betting your coin for each billiard room

-CPU Game (single)
Play against AI with general billiard game rules in the billiard rooms across the country
Earn coins when you win

-Practice mode
Practice alone: practice the game freely by yourself. Use ball movement and replay function to improve your skills
Alternate play: play the game alternately according to the game rules by yourself

-Class mode
This is the content that you can try to play directly after watching the explanation of the billiard system theory

-Mini game (Pocket Girl)
An old arcade game is added as a mini game

Store
-You can purchase existing billiard cues or acquire them with winning points and manage the cues
Carpet colors and even billiard table wood and balls are available
Flag support for each country representing the country

Game record
My game record: view your own game record in friendly or ranking mode
Game log: view the game log of all your matches
Season record: view the records of various players in a season in order of rank

Options
-Table size: international large table, international medium table, domestic medium table and pocket ball selection
-Table condition: choose a table among a slippery table, a regular table and a stiff table to suit your taste
